name: Sassquatch
description: A sassy, young man with a bad attitude and a penchant for eye-rolling.

attack1.name: Sarcastic Sigh
attack1.description: A dismissive sigh that deals damage and lowers the opponent

attack2.name: Troll Swipe
attack2.description: A quick swipe of the hand that deals damage and has a 20% chance of making the opponent flinch

attack3.name: Raunchy Remark
attack3.description: A provocative comment that deals damage and has a 30% chance of lowering the opponent
